ritual.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a ceremony that is always performed in the same way, in order to mark an important religious or social occasion
ritual.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: the importance of religion and ritual in our lives
The lady of the house performs the sacred ritual of lighting two candles.
ritual.translation[0].definitions[1].def: something that you do regularly and in the same way each time
ritual.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: He went through the ritual of lighting his cigar.
ritual.translation[1].definitions[0].def: done as part of a rite or ritual
ritual.translation[1].definitions[1].def: done in a fixed and expected way, but without real meaning or sincerity
ritual.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: The police issued the usual ritual apology.
